==How to activate/deactivate Apps2SD on LCR==

= Apps2SD =

YOU MUST HAVE A EXT3 PARTITION ON YOUR SDCARD FOR THIS TO WORK! RECOMMENDED TO BE 500MB EXT3!


= How to activate and diactivate =

----

===To activate:===

*adb remount

*adb shell apps2sd on

*adb reboot

----

===To deactivate:===

*adb remount

*adb shell apps2sd off

*adb reboot
